XXacatstvu:3: sa sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣanṃaṇḍalānugataḥ kāyo dharmasvabhāvagatiṃgatatvān manomaya ity ucyate /
XXacatstvu:4: yadā cittaṃ manaś cāpi vijñānaṃ na pravartate /
XXacatstvu:5: tadā manomayaṃ kāyaṃ labhate buddhabhūmiṃ ca //
XXacatstvu:8: tathā sa sarvaśaś cittamanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāpagato 'navagṛhīta ākāśasamo 'bhyavakāśaprakṛtito 'vatīrṇaś cānutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāpta ity ucyate /
XXacatstvu:9_0: tatra bhavanto jinaputrāḥ evaṃ kṣāntisamanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ sahapratilambhād acalāyā
XXacatstvu:9_1: bodhisattvabhūmer gaṃbhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāram anuprāpto bhavati durājñānam asaṃbhinnaṃ
XXacatstvu:10: sa evaṃ kṣāntipratilabdho bodhisattvo yatra yatropasaṃkrāmati kṣatriyabrāhmaṇavaiśyaśūdradevabrahmapariṣadaṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇītīrthikamāraparṣadaṃ (Css 239)
XXacatstvu:11: sarvatrātīto niḥśaṅkam upasaṃkrāmati viśārada eva pravyāharati /
XXacatstvu:13_0: sa hy anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāt sarvadharmānutpādākāreṇa sarvathā sarvaṃ pratividdhavāstu
XXacatstvu:13_1: .. mād asya aparajñānakṛtaṃ kleśakṛtaṃ ca parṣacchāradyaṃ nāstīti vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ
XXacatstvu:23: ity evaṃ daśavaśitāprāpto yas tvaṃ dṛṣṭivipannasya lokasyāsya hitodyata ity anena ca praśastapratipattir ameyatvam acittatā coktā /
XXacatstvu:24: vakṣyamāneṣv api sarveṣu pratyekam arthatrayaṃ yojyam /
XXacatstvu:28_0: tatra dharmāś caturvidhā vipaśyanādharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanādayaḥ bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ
XXacatstvu:28_1: smṛtyupasthānādayaḥ buddhadharmā daśabalavaiśāradyādayaḥ adhigamadharmāḥ śrotaāpattimārgaphalādayo yathākramam /
XXacatstvu:30: tatra bauddhaṃ cakṣur dhyānābhisaṃskāranirvṛttam abhijñāsaṃgṛhītam aṣṭāvidhaparikarmalabhyatvāt kumārabhuvaḥ /
XXacatstvu:32: iti / tenāpi cakṣuṣā tvayā na kiṃcid dṛṣṭaṃ saṃbhāvyate prāg evetaraiḥ /
XXacatstvu:33: pañcānām api cakṣuṣām anavabhāsagamanatvāt tattvārthasya dṛṣṭijñānam /
XXacatstvu:35: nanu pratilabdhaprathamādibhuvo 'pi āryā na kaṃcid dharmam upalabhante tat ko 'syātiśaya ity āha /
XXacatstvu:38: pūrvakās tu sapta vihārā vyāmiśrā ayam ekāntaśuddhaḥ /
XXacatstvu:40: yadā punaḥ sarvaprāyogikacaryāṃ vihāya saptamyā bhūmer aṣṭamīṃ bhūmim avakrānto bhavati tadā pariśuddhaṃ bodhisattvayānam abhirūhya ityādi /
XXacatstvu:41: tasmād eva gambhīrāṇāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ nānyo 'smād adhiko gaṃbhīro ity atrānuttarety ucyate //
XXacatstvu:42: pravicayo lakṣaṇataḥ kṛtyato hetutaḥ phalataḥ saṃkhyāta āsvādata ādīnavato niḥsaraṇataś ca kleśato vyavadānataḥ parijñātaḥ prahāṇataḥ sākṣātkaraṇato bhāvanātaś ca /
XXacatstvu:50: tathā coktaṃ yāvat tathāgatavaineyikānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatakāyavarṇarūpam ādarśayati /
XXacatstvu:51: iti hi bho jinaputra yāvanto 'nabhilāpyeṣu buddhakṣetraprasareṣu sattvānām upapattyāyatanādhimuktiprasarās teṣu teṣu tathāgataḥ svakāyavibhaktim ādarśayati /
XXacatstvu:53: tac cāsya kāyasaṃdarśanam akṣūṇam avandhyaṃ ca sarvasattvaparipākavinayāyetyādi /
XXacatstvu:55: tathā hi saptamyāṃ bhūmau buddhakāyavyūhaṃ jānāti na tu tadā niṣpādayituṃ śaknoti /
XXacatstvu:56: buddhakāyavyūhajñānāt tu tasyāṃ bhūmau niṣpādanecchāṃ jānāti /
XXacatstvu:59: etasyā eva kṣānteḥ sahapratilambhād yāny asya sugatidurgativipākyāni karmāvaraṇāni tāny asya samucchinnāni bhavanti /
XXacatstvu:60: anyatra (Css 242) tathāgatānām anāgatajanatānukampadarśanād ata etadvibhāge ślokaḥ /
XXacatstvu:64: tatrotpādavigamān nityo nirodhavigamād dhruvaḥ śivo dvayābhāvāt /
XXacatstvu:70: sarveṣv apy avasthitārthatrayopasaṃhāradvāreṇā bhagavato guṇānāṃ kīrtanena prasūtapuṇyasyāsyāṃ bhuvi sattvānāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanāya pariṇāmanārthenaika uktaḥ /
XXacatstvu:71: tatra praśastagamanād punarāvṛttyā ca sugataḥ atarkyatvād alāpyatvād āryajñānād acintyatety acintyaḥ aprameyaṃ aprameyāśrayaparāvṛttyā vibhutvalābhāt /
XXacatstvu:72: tathā hy asyāṃ bhūmau nirantamahābodhisamudāgamaprayogasamādhiṣu vyavasthito bodhisattvo
XXacatstvu:78: svābhāvikī syād yadi vastusiddhir udīrṇadīpetaraśāntisiddhivat tadā sarvakleśamaheśvarasya carato mohasya śāntiḥ katham /
XXacatstvu:80: pratītyajānāṃ bhāvānāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ jagādaya ityādy āha /
XXacatstvu:82_0: (Css 243) iha bodhisattvas tenāpi vihāreṇa gaṃbhīreṇāsaṃtuṣṭa uttarijñānaviseṣatām
XXacatstvu:82_1: anugacchan yaiś ca dharmajñānābhisaṃskāraiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmaḥ sarvākāro bodhisattvena
XXacatstvu:82_2: deśayitavyo yac ca dharmākhyānakṛtyaṃ tat sarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXacatstvu:84_0: gahanopavicāreṣu ye ca saṃkliśyante viśuddhyante yena ca saṃkliśyante viśuddhyante
XXacatstvu:84_1: yac ca saṃkleṣavyavadānaṃ yā ca tasyānaikāntikatā yā ca tasyaikāntikānaikāntikatā
XXacatstvu:85: evaṃ ca deśanākuśalasya deśanākṛtyakuśalasya ca yat sarvākāramahādharmabhāṇakatvam ityādi yathāsūtram eva vistarato veditavyam /
XXacatstvu:86: asamajñānam iti daśamyāṃ tathāgatakṛtyenāvasthitatvād yathoktam āryadaśabhūmake /
XXacatstvu:87: yāvad daśānāṃ samādhyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇāṃ paryante sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣekavān nāma bodhisattvasamādhir āmukhībhavatītyādi /
XXacatstvu:90: na punaḥ kurute yatnaṃ paripākāya dehinām // 1
XXacatstvu:91: yo yathā yena vaineyo manyate 'sau tathaiva ca /
XXacatstvu:97: athā cāṇoḥ pṛthivyāś ca goṣpadasyodādheś ca yat /
XXacatstvu:98: antaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ buddhasya ca tad antaram // 5
XXacatstvu:101: acintyam iti yathoktaṃ sa khalu bho jinaputra bodhisattva evam imāṃ bhūmim anugato 'cintyaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratilabhate 'nāvaraṇaṃ cetyādi /
XXacatstvu:103: piṇḍiteṣu rajāṃsi yāvanti guṇā daśamyāṃ bhavanti tāvanta ihāsya tāvad ity anidarśanam uktaṃ bhagavatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmivyavasthitabodhisattvaguṇanirdeśe /
XXacatstvu:105: tad yathā śūnyatālakṣaṇam animittalakṣaṇam apraṇihitalakṣaṇaṃ niḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ paratantralakṣaṇaṃ ca /
XXacatstvu:106: tatra ṣadbhiḥ ṣadbhis tribhir deśanākṛtyārthabhedena yathākramaṃ trīṇi lakṣaṇāny uktāni /
XXacatstvu:107: ekenaiṣām eva trayāṇām upasaṃhāraḥ ṣadbhiḥ saptabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saptabhiś ca śeṣāniboddhavyāni /
XXacatstvu:108_0: iti māyādidṛṣṭāntair ityādi saptabhiḥ ślokair yathākramaṃ guṇakathanamukhena sarveṣām
XXacatstvu:108_1: upasaṃhāraḥ kām apy acintyāṃ paramagambhirāvasthāṃ prāptatvād asya vihārasyeti bhavaddṛśā
XXacatstvu:109: asyām eva bhuvi sattvānāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanāya puṇyapariṇāmanam ity anyaḥ // //
XXacatstvu:113: phalāvasthām ārabhya sarva evānāśravā dharmāḥ sarvaprakārām anuttarāṃ viśuddhim upagatavantaḥ saṃbuddhākhyāṃ pratilabhante /
XXacatstvu:114: teṣāṃ hetvavasthāyām eva tāvad aśūnyatā prāg eva phalāvasthāyām ity āha //
XXacatstvu:116: anutpannam anālayam iti anutpannasvabhāvenetyāder yāvad gambhīrāya namo 'stu ta ity etadantasya sūcanam //
XXacatstvu:121: abhimukhyāḥ prabhṛti viśeṣataḥ pratilabdhānām anutpādādīnāṃ niratiśayārthena pañca tasyāḥ prabhṛti nirodhalābhād āvaraṇadvayavāsanāśeṣasyāpy abhāvāt paramagāmbhīryārthenaikaḥ /
XXacatstvu:122: evaṃ stute stuto bhūyāḥ saṃvṛtyeti śeṣaḥ athavā kiṃ bata stutaḥ paramārthena /
XXacatstvu:125: idānīṃ saṃvṛtyāpi stuter asaṃbhavaṃ pratipādayann āha /
XXacatstvu:130: grāhakagrāhyanirmukto bhagavān sa ca grāhake grāhye ca caratīti /
XXacatstvu:132: acintyapratītyasamutpādadharmatayā saty advaye 'pi prakṛter abhāvād iti //
XXacatstvu:137: etāvantam evārtham adhikṛtyābhisamayakramaḥ prajñāpāramitādiṣu vistareṇokto boddhavyaḥ //
